name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Proficient in **Java**, **AWS**, **Kafka**, **Python**, **SQL**, and multithreading, leveraging these technologies to design and implement scalable and reliable applications. Experienced in developing complex solutions within the financial sector, demonstrating strong analytical ability and financial knowledge. Recognized for fostering cross-functional teamwork, ensuring seamless collaboration across departments. With a solid background as a Full-Stack Software Engineer, I excel in creating user-centric applications and am dedicated to delivering clean, efficient code through robust architecture and automation.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** for developing robust microservices, playing a crucial role in a clinical patient management system project that achieved **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and significantly improved adherence rates through automated reminders.
Leveraged **AWS** services to establish a cloud infrastructure that maintained **99.9%** uptime for microservices running on EKS (Kubernetes), employing **Terraform** for efficient resource management.
Implemented **multithreading** techniques in Java to enhance system performance, ensuring rapid response times under high loads.
Developed high-performance APIs using **Spring Boot** and **Spring Data JPA**, resulting in a **40%** improvement in data accuracy and secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Applied **analytical ability** to improve UI/UX for the pathway builder, utilizing **React** and **Ant Design**, which decreased user completion time by **30%**.
Built a high-performance notification system with **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery, demonstrating strong cross-functional teamwork in integrating various system components.
Established CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, which led to an **80%** reduction in deployment times and increased development efficiency.
Containerized applications with **Docker**, fostering a seamless deployment process across different environments and leveraging services like **Memcached** and **Redis caching** for optimized performance.

• Developed backend services using **Java (Spring Boot)**, enhancing backend performance and stability, which contributed to a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
• Implemented **Kafka** for a notification system, achieving an impressive **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues, demonstrating strong analytical ability and cross-functional teamwork.
• Leveraged **Python** for data analysis to drive insights, improving resolution rates by **20%** through the creation of a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**.
• Automated testing and deployment using **Jenkins** and **AWS** CodePipeline, ensuring a consistent release process and leading to enhanced efficiency in development.
• Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** with **Docker** and **Terraform**, significantly reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**, showcasing expertise in cloud services and deployment strategies.

Utilized **Java** and **AWS** to design and implement robust backend systems, ensuring high availability with **98% uptime**.
Employed **SQL** for database management, achieving efficient data retrieval with **PostgreSQL**.
Developed multithreading capabilities to enhance performance under load, optimizing execution times by **30%**.
Collaborated cross-functionally to integrate **Kafka** messaging, improving data processing speeds.
Applied analytical ability to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, contributing to a **40%** reduction in system load times.
Developed and maintained efficient cache management using **Memcached** and **Ignite**, enhancing user experience.
Conducted rigorous testing with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, minimizing defects in production by **30%**.
